title: Enhancing Healthcare Practical Competencies: IT-Business Alignment and Business Model Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the concept of IT-business alignment and analyze its connection to organizational learning.
Learners can design innovation- and efficiency-driven business models considering a data-driven culture.
Learners can assess the interaction between IT strategy and business models based on case studies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
